about.name: About me
about.text: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science at the Federal University of Ceará (UFC). I have solid experience building REST APIs with Python (mainly using FastAPI, and also with experience in Django) and TypeScript, and I’ve worked with front-end technologies like React and Svelte. I also have a good understanding of both relational (PostgreSQL, MySQL) and non-relational databases (MongoDB).
